ygData.subject: RE: Heard Brewing was nerfed, is pottery still profitable?
ygData.msgSnippet: I was potting last night at 4am est. Still profitable. However, I am positive that pottery is next to be neutered. I intend to pot till I drop or till they
ygData.messageBody:
I was potting last night at 4am est. Still profitable. However, I am
positive that pottery is next to be neutered. I intend to pot till I drop or
till they kill it. (I need some cash to master smithing)

Graedon

-----Original Message-----
From: Mitchell Okun [mailto:Mitchell_Okun@...]
Sent: Wednesday, July 14, 1999 8:32 AM
To: EQ_Potters@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ_Potters] Heard Brewing was nerfed, is pottery still
profitable?


From: "Mitchell Okun" <Mitchell_Okun@...>



<<
Heard Brewing was nerfed, is pottery still profitable as of this morning?>>

The word on my Ranger list is that Pottery was screwed as well. The last
time i
was potting was about 3pm (EST) Tuesday, and the profit margin was still the
same. However, the word was around the potters in Bertoxx in Kelethin (we
all
know each other, lines at the wheel), was that we were going down tonight.

How stupid. It seems they are forcing you to be a "/auction i am the
10000th
person selling jewelry" kind of trader if you want to make a profit. I find
pottery nice and relaxing, and a welcome change. No reason to do it if i'm
not
going to make at least some money, however.

- Nikolita, Floating Merchant
